member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentController
member.summary: CRUD (and all db methods) Attachment Methods
member.remarks: Added by Skeel

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentController.GetAllByPostID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of AttachmentInfo related to a Post

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentController.GetAllByUserID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of AttachmentInfo related to a UserId and NOT related to any posts

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo
member.summary: A single instance of the AttachmentInfo Object.
member.remarks: Added by Skeel

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.FormatBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Formats an integer value presumed as bytes to bytes/KB/MB/GB

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.AttachmentID
member.summary: The PK AttachmentID associated with the file.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.FileID
member.remarks: All attachments must be part of the DNN File system.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.PostID
member.summary: The PostID the attachment is associated with.

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.UserID
member.summary: UserID - we need this to collect "lost" attachments

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.LocalFileName
member.summary: LocalFileName - Used for the user to identify the file uploaded

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.FileName
member.summary: FileName - Actual FileName from DNN Files (generated through the GUID model)

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.Extension
member.summary: Extension - We use this display either image or link depending of extension

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.Inline
member.summary: Inline will return true, if the attachment is to be placed inline the postbody

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.Width
member.summary: Width (Will only apply for image files)

member.name: P:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Components.AttachmentInfo.Height
member.summary: Height (Will only apply for image files)

members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface
The Id of the module to be imported The content to be imported The version of the module to be imported The Id of the user performing the import -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.name: T:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Controls.AttachmentControl
member.summary: A subcontrol used to upload, display and select Attachments

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Controls.AttachmentControl.Page_Init(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the control is loaded, we want to make sure the cmdUpload is registered for postback because of the nature of the file upload control and security.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Controls.AttachmentControl.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the control is loaded, we want to make sure the cmdUpload is registered for postback because of the nature of the file upload control and security.

member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Modules.uDebate_Discussion.Controls.AttachmentControl.cmdUpload_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This uploads a file which generates a GUID name, uses original image extension as save type.

member.summary: Deletes the selected uploaded file, using the DNN filesystem
